src:
Bonek Mania Diminta Menahan Diri untuk Tidak Datang ke Bogor
07 Nov 2019, 05:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajemen Persebaya Surabaya mengimbau kepada pendukungnya, Bonek Mania untuk menahan diri agar tidak datang ke Stadion Pakansari, Cibinong, Bogor, Jawa Barat, pada laga melawan PS Tira Persikabo, Sabtu (9/11/2019).
Sebab, Persebaya tengah menjalankan sanksi dari Komisi Disiplin PSSI. Yakni hukuman bertanding tanpa suporter, baik kandang maupun tandang sampai akhir musim kompetisi.
"Berharap Bonek menahan diri untuk tidak datang ke Bogor, karena status pertandingan sesuai hukuman komdis adalah tanpa suporter Persebaya," kata Sekretaris Persebaya, Ram Surahman kepada Bola.net.
Terlebih, Persebaya juga dalam proses pengajuan banding kepada Komite Banding PSSI. Ram tidak ingin ada kejadian yang membuat upaya banding tersebut menjadi sia-sia.
"Jadi kalau memang cinta Persebaya ayo kawal bersama-sama proses banding itu. Jangan sampai nanti menjadi kontra produktif akibat ulah pihak yang tidak bertanggung jawab," tegasnya.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Bonek Mania Is Asked To Refrain From Coming To Bogor
Nov 7 2019, 05:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya management appealed to supporters, Bonek Mania to refrain from coming to the Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong, Bogor, West Java, in the match against PS Tira Persikabo, Saturday (9/11/2019).
Because, Persebaya was running sanctions from the PSSI Disciplinary Commission. Namely the penalty of competing without supporters, both home and away until the end of the season.
"Hoping Bonek refrained from coming to Bogor, because the match status according to the commissions' punishment was without Persebaya supporters," Persebaya Secretary Ram Surahman told Bola.net.
Moreover, Persebaya is also in the process of submitting an appeal to the PSSI Appeals Committee. Ram did not want any incident that made the appeal attempt in vain.
"So if you really love Persebaya, let's go along with the appeal process. Don't let it become counter productive due to the actions of irresponsible parties," he said.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
